segment.source: By default, the toggle switch includes literal On and Off labels, which are localized automatically.
segment.target: By default, the toggle switch includes literal On and Off labels, which are localized automatically.

segment.source: You can replace these labels by setting the OnContent, and OffContent properties.
segment.target: You can replace these labels by setting the OnContent, and OffContent properties.

segment.source: This example replaces the On/Off labels with Show/Hide labels.
segment.target: This example replaces the On/Off labels with Show/Hide labels.

segment.source: You can also use more complex content by setting the OnContentTemplate and OffContentTemplate properties.
segment.target: You can also use more complex content by setting the OnContentTemplate and OffContentTemplate properties.

segment.source: Recommendations
segment.target: Recommendations

segment.source: Replace the On and Off labels when there are more specific labels for the setting.
segment.target: Replace the On and Off labels when there are more specific labels for the setting.

segment.source: If there are short (3-4 characters) labels that represent binary opposites that are more appropriate for a particular setting, use those.
segment.target: If there are short (3-4 characters) labels that represent binary opposites that are more appropriate for a particular setting, use those.

segment.source: For example, you could use "Show/Hide" if the setting is "Show images."
segment.target: For example, you could use "Show/Hide" if the setting is "Show images."

segment.source: Using more specific labels can help when localizing the UI.
segment.target: Using more specific labels can help when localizing the UI.

segment.source: Avoid replacing the On and Off labels unless you must; stick with the default labels unless the situation calls for custom ones.
segment.target: Avoid replacing the On and Off labels unless you must; stick with the default labels unless the situation calls for custom ones.

segment.source: Labels should be no more than 4 characters long.
segment.target: Labels should be no more than 4 characters long.
